title: Cognitive Engineering-Based Simultaneous Interpretation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational interpretation skills and ability to interpret mathematical symbols
context.additional_context: Multimodal resource-based training environment specialized in multilingual conversion of mathematical terms and formulas

learning_goals: Learners can simultaneously interpret a 2-minute mathematical passage into the target language with a delay time of 10 seconds or less.
Learners can integrate auditory, visual, and textual information to interpret and convey mathematical concepts with 90% accuracy.
Learners can reduce error rates by 40% by applying cognitive load management strategies during task performance.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
